snippet: Phil Mickelson, on his 42nd birthday and a day before Father's Day, shot his second straight 71 at the Olympic Club for a three-day total of eight-over 218.
abstract: Phil Mickelson, on his 42nd birthday and a day before Father's Day, shot his second straight 71 at the Olympic Club for a three-day total of eight-over 218.

headline.main: Mickelson, With Plenty to Celebrate, Is Hoping for One More Reason
headline.print_headline: Mickelson Is Not Getting What He Really Wants for His Birthday
